channel.description: Recent content in linux on bad gateway

item.title: kernel patching with dkms
item.description: How do you maintain a patched version of an in-tree Linux kernel module?

item.title: better remote desktop
item.description: I was looking for something that I could use to log in to my desktop over a not so good WAN link and ended up forking Chromium.

item.title: slow your network down
item.description: Have you you ever wanted to deliberately slow down your network to test your web service over a flaky connection? You can do it with netem, the Network Emulator.
